clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: While advertising to this site, our third-party advertisers may place or recognize a unique cookie or web beacon on your browser.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: Referral Data (the address of the last URL a user visited prior to clicking through to KidzSearch)

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: You hereby agree that any dispute arising from or relating to the use of this Web site will be subject to binding arbitration under the commercial rules of the American Arbitration Association.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: KidzSearch tracks user activity for reporting purposes, but only collects non-identifiable IP addresses. This is sent to our partner, Google.com for analytics reporting in order to maintain our internal operations as permitted by COPPA.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
As required by COPPA, we do not show any ads that are interest-based.
We only allow ads that are contextual, meaning it is related to the page a user is viewing and not based on any identifiable information or past sites visited.
This is done by opting-out of this feature with our ad network partners.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
clauses.description: User accounts can be terminated for having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly, meaning they cannot be terminated without a reason, but only for a limited number of reasons. Additionally, user accounts will not be deleted after a first infringement.
clauses.clause_text: KidzSearch has adopted a policy of terminating, in appropriate circumstances and at KidzSearch's sole discretion, subscribers or account holders who are deemed to be repeat infringers.

case.text: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (California, USA)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: By using or visiting KidzSearch, you agree that the internal laws of the State of California, without regard to the principles of conflicts of laws

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.
clauses.clause_text: None of our features require an account for usage.

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: What personal information does KidzSearch collect?

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: IN NO EVENT SHALL KidzSearch, ITS AFFILIATES, AND/OR THEIR RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF, OR IN ANY WAY CONNECTED WITH, THE USE OF THIS WEB SITE OR WITH THE DELAY OR INABILITY TO USE THIS WEB SITE, OR FOR ANY INFORMATION, PRODUCTS, AND SERVICES OBTAINED THROUGH THIS WEB SITE, OR OTHERWISE ARISING OUT OF THE USE OF THIS WEB SITE, WHETHER BASED ON CONTRACT, TORT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR OTHERWISE, EVEN IF KidzSearch, ITS AFFILIATES, AND/OR THEIR RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF DAMAGES.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: This Web site is for your personal and non-commercial use

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: you will not use this Web site for any illegal purpose

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: KidzSearch collects statistics on which keywords a visitor searches and which responses they select.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: THE INFORMATION, PRODUCTS, AND SERVICES PUBLISHED ON THIS WEB SITE MAY INCLUDE INACCURACIES OR TYPOGRAPHICAL ERRORS.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text:
The KidzSearch site contains links to other Web sites that may ask for personal information.
Although we try to review such sites carefully, KidzSearch expressly disclaims any responsibility or liability for their privacy policies

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
clauses.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text:
If you believe that anything on the Site infringes any copyright which you own or control please contact us about and we will promptly remove it.

Please see 17 U.S.C. 512(c)(3) for the requirements of a proper notification.

case.text: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.
clauses.clause_text: KidzSearch, ITS AFFILIATES, AND/OR THEIR RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS HEREBY DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS WITH REGARD TO THIS INFORMATION, PRODUCTS, AND SERVICES, INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

clauses.clause_text: We also may collect IP Addresses (which domain a visitor is logged on from),
